headline.main: WITNESS AT SPY TRIAL ADMITS LYING TO FBI; Stigler Says Much of Signed Statement Was False

lead_paragraph: Franz Joseph Stigler, former chief baker on the United States Lines steamers Manhattan and America, and a defendant in the Brooklyn espionage trial, admitted yesterday on cross-examination that he had lied to FBI agents about his connection with an alleged Nazi spy ring, following his arrest last June.
abstract: admits statement to FBI was false
